climbs.name: Preying Mantles
climbs.fa: Evans, Floyd, Rob Stahl, T. Burke

content.description: Climb on the right edge of the west face just left of the arete. Pass one bolt, a crack section, face climb to top.
content.protection: A small rack to 2", one bolt.

content.description: This route is on the small gray west facing crag just north of the large brown slab with Freriks is a Daddy. This crag has 4 or 5 short routes on good rock. This is the route on the left edge of the face. It was named after Craig Fry and his habit of showing up and trying to snake a TR on the FA in progress.
content.protection: A very small rack of wired nuts and tcus, one bolt just past the halfway point.

climbs.name: My President Is Addicted To War

content.description: This route is on the gray varnished crag 20 meters north of the cliff with "The Opportunist". On its right edge is a route with one bolt. Climb past the bolt, go right and climb the easy arete. We tried to force it out left as there is a patch of sweet varnish but, the lack of line or holds forced the arete. This is the route that is in the old guide as "Unnamed."
content.protection: One bolt, bring a small rack to 2"

content.description: Although the rock at the bottom is not very good it gets better and better. Tie off the thread and start liebacking and side-pulling on up. This route is a lot like "Wired", technical with thin pro, but longer.
content.protection: This route needs only a selection of wired stoppers, RP's and small cams (up to 2 ") as well as a sling to tie off the thread at the start. Tie off boulders on top for the belay anchor.

content.description: This route is just left of center. Climb a groove to a bolt 5.10- R. Pass a small roof after placing a very small nut (RP) in a good slot.
